publicwhip.spmotion: *S3M-3633 Bill Wilson: Israel Prize Laureates’ Call for End to Demolition of East Jerusalem Homes—That the Parliament applauds the 21 Israeli prize laureates who called for an end to the razing of homes in east Jerusalem, as reported in the Haaretz newspaper on 4 March 2009, and notes that the first phase of the 2003 roadmap to peace in the Middle East called for a cessation of home demolitions and for other trust-building steps.
S3M-3633 Israel Prize Laureates’ Call for End to Demolition of East Jerusalem Homes (lodged on 6 March 2009) Sandra White*, Jamie Hepburn*, Elaine Murray*, Bob Doris*, Bill Kidd*, Robin Harper*
S3M-3633 Israel Prize Laureates’ Call for End to Demolition of East Jerusalem Homes (lodged on 6 March 2009) Hugh O’Donnell*, Pauline McNeill*
S3M-3633 Israel Prize Laureates’ Call for End to Demolition of East Jerusalem Homes (lodged on 6 March 2009) Stuart McMillan*, Gil Paterson*
S3M-3633 Israel Prize Laureates’ Call for End to Demolition of East Jerusalem Homes (lodged on 6 March 2009) Joe FitzPatrick*
